# Notunganya inkuru yanje gute kugira nshiremwo ikibazo nyamukuru, aho iryohera, nitorwa ry'umuti?  
##Mur'ikicigwa, muza kwiga:  
• Ingene ufatanya hamwe ikibazo nyamukuru, uburyohe, nitorwa ry'umuti mu nkuru yawe.  
• Ingene ico bita mumpfunyampfunyo Arc d'une histoire gikoreshwa munkuru zibinyamakuru.  
• Ingene utegura iyo Arc atatorwa ry'umuti riboneka neza.

Munyigisho zambere, wize ingene itunganywa zibice vy'inkuru risanzwe rikorwa: ikibazo nyamukuru, aho inkuru iryohera, n'itorwa ry'umuti wayo. Ukwiriye rero kwisunga uru rutonde munkuru yawe kugira ushobora gushika neza kuco washaka. Ibi rero biba ukoresheje uburyo bwitunganywa bita mumpfunyampfunyo arc d'une histoire canke arc de tension. Ku nkuru zigufi canke inyandiko, iyo bita Arc iba isanzwe: nkakarorero, ikurikiza urutonde rwingene ibintu vyagiye biraba.

Inkuru ikomeye iva mugushikiriza ikibazo nyamukuru gushika ahobiryohera igihe nyakibazo nyamukuru kironkeye inyishu kandi kikongera kikaronswa umuti werekana ibizovamwo canke ibizoshikwako. Inkuru zikomeye zituma abazikurikirana baguma babaza “Nigiki gikurikira” uko wonguruza uva kugice kimwe cinkuru uja kukindi. Igice cose c'inkuru carigikwiriye gutangwa muburyo buduza ubukomere bwayo. Ibi bice, canke Intambwe, nizo zigize ubukomezi bwayo.

![Umuheto mumpfunyampfunyo Arc](1.png)  
Aha niho ushimikira mugutegura inkuru ikomeye. Inkuru zikurikiza urutonde ngwingene zigenda zikomera uhereye kukibazo nyamukuru gushika igihe biryohera inyishu yacakibazo nyamukuru ibonetse, kandi ushitse nokugitorera umuti, wongeyeho bigatanga n'umunezero kubagukurikiranye.

Iyi nfatiro ikomoka kukuntu inkuru zinkinamico zandikwa mugabo iranakoreshwa neza nibinyamakuru canke mumwuga wokumenyesha amakuru. Nyamba ugomba gutegura inkuru zibinyamakuru, ubwirizwa gushimikira kubigaragara kandi ugakoresha ivyo ushobora gutohoza, mugabo nahone urashobora gutera inkuru zishemeye mugushira mungiro iyi nfatiro. kwifuza gutunganya uburyo bw'inkuru ihambaye ntibikwiriye kuguhubisha mutanga ryawe ry'inkuru. Inkuru zikwiriye gufasha no kwongereza ubumenyi bwawe nk'umumenyesha makuru. Ubumenyesha makuru bwawe sibwo bukwiriye gufasha inkuru.

Iyo bita mumpfunyampfunyo Arc irashobora kunkuru zimwe zimwe kudashika kuburyohe bwayo bwanyuma no gutorerwa umuti imbere yuko hagera kuyishikiriza. Ushobora gukenera guhitamwo uburyohe bucagaguye canke bugufi. Rimwe na rimwe, kubera ata torerwa ry'umuti rinyaruka ririho birashobora kuryosha inkuru vyonyene. Nkakarorero: iyo, naho impanuka zitewe n'imiduga ziguma zishika, abarongozi ataco bagize kugira ihuriro ryamabarabara ritunganizwe.

Iyo uriko ukora kunkuru itazotorerwa umuti imbere yigihe cokuyishikiriza, woca uhitamwo kuronka umuntu avuga kukigereranyo igishobora kuzovamwo canke ukavuga kuvyereke kazoza nijwi ryawe. Ariko witwararike kuvuga kukibazo nyamukuru cawe mugusozera.

##IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA  
• Inkuru zikozwe muburyo bwa Arc kugira bifashe kuduza inkomezi zazo no gutuma abazikurikirana baguma bazishaka.  
• Arc yawe ishobora guhera kubintu vyintangamarara, imbere yuko abayikurikirana bamenya ikibazo nyamukuru.  
• Inkuru zose ntizizoba zatorewe umuti imbere yuko umwanya wokuzishikiriza ugera.

cards.question: Nivyo canke Sivyo: nzoba mfise inkuru ikomeye igihe cose mfise ibice vy'inkuru vyerekeye ikibazo nyamukuru ningene iryoshe.
Muruhe rutonde narinkwiriye gutuganyamwo ibice vy'inkuru ikomeye nkuko vyitwa mumpfunyampfunyo Arc d'une histoire forte

choices.text: Mugihe nzoba nashizemwo ibice vyose, inkuru yanje izoba iri neza.
Ukuryoha kw'inkuru kwari gukwiriye kuza imbere; ibindi bice ntaco bivuze.
Inkuru itangura ishikiriza ikibazo nyamukuru, igaca ija kw'ingene iryoshe, kandi igaherana nukwitanze umuti wikibazo nyamukuru.
Inkuru itangura ishikiriza ingene iryoshe, igaca ija ku kibazo nyamukuru, kandi igaherana nukwitanze umuti wikibazo nyamukuru.

cards.question: Nivyo canke Sivyo. Ndashobora gukoresha ibintu vyintangamarara kugira ntagure kwerekana ubukomezi bw'inkuru imbere yuko ntomora neza ikibazo nyamukuru.
Nshobora gutunganya gute inkuru niyo bita mumpfunyampfunyo Arc iyo ata torerwa ry'umuti mu nkuru yanje ririho imbere yuko isohorwa? (Hashobora kuba inyishu zirenga imwe)

choices.text: Ni sawa gutanga iciyumviro mugihe cose hari itorwa ry'umuti.
Ndashobora gukoresha uburyohe bugufi mu nkuru yagutse, ikibandanya.
Ndashobora gutumira umuntu avuga kukigereranyo igishobora kuzovamwo
